Interface RepInfoUsage

public interface RepInfoUsage
Simple use of RepresentationInformation.

  • Method Details

    • getApplication

      String[] getApplication(RepresentationInformation ri)
      Get names of applications to use
      Parameters:
      ri - Representation Information
      Returns:
      array of names of applications which are likely to be able to use the DataObject for which ri is the RepresentationInformation.

    • setApplication

      void setApplication(RepresentationInformation ri, String[] appNames)
      Set the name of applications
      Parameters:
      ri - The Representation Information for which the application may be useful.
      appNames - The name of the applications to try.

    • executeApp

      void executeApp(String appName, DataObject dato)
      Execute the named application, inputting the DataObject. This could be something like displaying an image or document or playing music. This is essentially a conceptual extension of MediaType that is used for Web browsers, which ignores Semantics.
      Parameters:
      appName - The name of the application to use
      dato - The DataObject from which to get the bytes to provide to the application.
